card_text: You can discard this card, then activate 1 of these effects;$N●Add 1 "Lunalight" monster from your Graveyard to your hand, except "Lunalight Black Sheep".$N●Add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand.$NIf this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Fusion Material for a Fusion Summon: You can add to your hand, 1 face-up "Lunalight" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck or 1 "Lunalight" monster from your Graveyard, except "Lunalight Black Sheep".
